I‚Äôm testing negative, back to 100% and ready to rock - so the tour will resume Tuesday in Milwaukee. Thanks so much for all the well-wishes, and sincerely apologies to everybody whose show now needs to be re-scheduled.

So‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve got COVID. Don‚Äôt worry, I‚Äôm fine - I‚Äôm vaxxed and double-boosted and the symptoms are very mild. But of course this means I unfortunately need to cancel the next couple dates on my tour (Saginaw & Detroit). I‚Äôm deeply sorry - we will reschedule those shows ASAP.
